sentences: While Verizon plans to cut a staggering 15,000 jobs or 15% of its workforce to navigate through subscriber losses and escalating operational challenges, competitors like AT&T and T-Mobile continue to aggressively expand and innovate, not showing signs of such drastic workforce reductions
This move highlights Verizon's struggle in a fiercely competitive market where others seem to be finding more stable footing.

boundStatOrQuote.span: Verizon intends to slash about 15,000 jobs, or 15% of its workforce
